meanings.sent1: Siderosis can happen when too much iron builds up in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors can detect siderosis through blood tests that show high iron levels.

meanings.sent1: Workers in mines need to wear masks to avoid siderosis from breathing in iron dust.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with siderosis after discovering iron particles in his lungs.

meanings.definition: The process of iron deposition in tissues.
meanings.sent1: Siderosis involves the slow buildup of iron in tissues over time.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the dangers of siderosis, where iron slowly damages tissues.
